https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/d3tAnhyYt82ivgzWOiyL7V9RHJ5.jpg When the critically acclaimed, tough and coming of age actress Thea Barfoed ends her rehab, she confronts a hard choice. During her heavy drinking period she divorced and lost custody of her two boys. Now she wants them to be a part of her life again. Applause
